text: Jules Sylvestre-Brac (born 18 August 1998) is a French professional footballer who plays as a defender for FC Villefranche, on loan from Grenoble. ==Club career== On 20 May 2019, Sylvestre-Brac signed with Grenoble Foot 38. He made his professional debut with Grenobole in a 0–0 Ligue 2 tie with FC Chambly on 9 August 2019. ==References== ==External links== * * * GF38 Profile * Category:Living people Category:1998 births Category:Association football defenders Category:French footballers Category:Grenoble Foot 38 players Category:FC Villefranche players Category:Ligue 2 players
title: Jules Sylvestre-Brac
